findings.title: [PG Genesis Contract-12] The _getUnClaimedReward_ function lacks the view keyword
findings.description: In the Validator contract, the _getUnClaimedReward_ function only serves a query purpose but is not marked with the 'view' keyword, which can result in unnecessary gas consumption when called.

findings.title: [PG Chain-1] Error in LogInfo of Parlia::distributeIncoming() method
findings.description: (delegatorReward+header.GasUsed) is subtracted from the coinbaseRewards value recorded in logInfo, but the actual coinbaseRewards added in the state only subtracts the delegateReward, which is inconsistent with the actual situation.

findings.title: [PG Genesis Contract-2] Incorrect balance checking logic
